patthana16.37:1.1_0: Parittārammaṇaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naparittārammaṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.37:1.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe terasa …pe… vipāke sattarasa
patthana16.37:2.1: Parittārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namahaggatārammaṇo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
